name: Name Type
description: Codes specifying the type or classification of a person's name for proper identification and context

values.definition: The formal name as registered in an official registry
Known as/conventional/the one you use. May also be known as a preferred name
A name assigned to a person, may include not knowing the person's name, or to maintain anonymity
A name you had just before you got married
A name that a person had shortly after being born. Usually for family names
A name used in a Professional or Business context, includes pseudonyms, stage names, etc.
e.g. Sister Mary Francis, Brother John
A name assigned on a temporary basis at birth
Information available but not provided due to security or privacy reasons

vendorVariations.epic: Supports standard codes with additional internal name categorization
vendorVariations.cerner: Standard implementation with validation for common name types
vendorVariations.allscripts: Supports primary codes (L, D, A, M, B, N)

generationRules.realistic: Official and customary names are most common, maiden names for married patients, business names for providers
